QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_JunctionBoxBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Base quantities that are common to the definition of all occurrences of junction box.

QtoDef.Name: GrossWeight
QtoDef.Definition: Total gross weight of the footing without add-on parts, not taking into account possible processing features (cut-out's, etc.) or openings and recesses.

QtoDef.Name: NumberOfGangs
QtoDef.Definition: Number of slots available for switches/outlets (most commonly 1, 2, 3, or 4).
